msgs:
Hi {profile.first_name}\! 🌷

1️⃣ You can make a report 📝, by\:
*Home* 👉 *Make a Report* 👉 [selecting report section] 👉 [select report] 👉 [filter parameter of report]

2️⃣ You can see your past reports 📃, by\:
Home 👉 Reports List 👉 [filter List by date]

3️⃣ You can see your profile and change it ✏️, by\:
Home 👉 Profile 👉 Change Profile 👉 [changing item you allowed]

4️⃣ You can go settings ⚙ and see About, Help and Support, by\:
Home 👉 settings

If there’s a question click *Support* and send a ticket to us\. 🙏

This bot was  born to make a report for business intelligence\.
You will be able to customize it too\.
Version 1\.0\.0
If you want to send a ticket to us, click the *New Ticket*\.
Please select one of these to change \.
Please select one of these sections\.
Please select one of these *Financial* subsection\.
Please select one of these *HR* subsection\.
